evidence.claim: CareBestie utilizes FHIR standards for healthcare data interchange.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring data security and privacy for health information.
CareBestie integrates with EHR systems leveraging standard interfaces, enhancing interoperability.
Their platform supports X12 transaction sets for claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse services on the website.
